attributes.action: join Barak Obama in his criticism of the banks and demand that we get every penny of our money back from the banks in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
President Barack Obama has said Wall Street must repay $117bn (£72bn) to taxpayers and criticised banks for "massive profits and obscene bonuses".

Gordon Brown must join Barak Obama and do the same in the UK without delay.
